message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think it's a great deal and will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly worth the initial price.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $87. This seems to be a fair price for both of us.
